response.en:
ЁЯМзя╕ПтЪая╕П **Heavy Rain Advisory for Farmers**

**Immediate Actions:**

ЁЯМ╛ **Standing Crops:**
тАв Create drainage channels to remove excess water
тАв Prop up lodged/fallen plants
тАв Don't enter waterlogged fields (spread diseases)
тАв Avoid any spray operations

ЁЯем **Vegetables:**
тАв Harvest mature vegetables immediately
тАв Raise bed height for new plantings
тАв Apply lime to prevent fungal diseases

ЁЯМ▒ **Nursery:**
тАв Cover with plastic sheet
тАв Provide drainage
тАв Spray fungicide after rain stops

ЁЯУж **Harvested Produce:**
тАв Store in dry, elevated place
тАв Cover properly
тАв Check for moisture regularly

**Post-Rain Actions:**
тАв Spray fungicide (Mancozeb 2g/L) after 24 hours
тАв Apply urea if yellowing occurs
тАв Check for pest buildup

ЁЯУЮ **Report crop damage to agriculture office for insurance**

тШАя╕ПЁЯПЬя╕П **Drought/Water Scarcity Advisory**

**Immediate Water Conservation:**

ЁЯТз **Irrigation Management:**
тАв Switch to drip/sprinkler irrigation
тАв Irrigate in evening/early morning (less evaporation)
тАв Use mulching (straw, plastic) to retain moisture
тАв Skip irrigation rows (alternate furrow irrigation)

ЁЯМ▒ **Crop Management:**
тАв Spray Potassium Chloride (KCl) 1% to reduce water loss
тАв Apply organic mulch 5-7 cm thick
тАв Remove weeds (compete for water)
тАв Spray anti-transpirant (Kaolin 6%)

ЁЯМ╛ **Crop Selection:**
тАв Prefer drought-tolerant varieties
тАв Short-duration crops
тАв Millets, Sorghum, Bajra for kharif
тАв Gram, Mustard for rabi (low water need)

ЁЯУК **Contingency Crops:**
тАв If delayed monsoon: Short-duration rice, Maize
тАв If early drought: Sorghum, Cowpea, Castor

ЁЯТ░ **Government Support:**
тАв Contact agriculture office for drought relief
тАв PMFBY claim if insured
тАв Input subsidy schemes

variations: how to protect crops from frost

response.en:
тЭДя╕П **Frost/Pala Protection Advisory**

**When Frost Expected (Temp < 4┬░C):**

ЁЯМЩ **Night Before Frost:**
тАв Light irrigation in evening (releases heat)
тАв Cover nursery/vegetables with straw/plastic
тАв Create smoke (burn waste) around field perimeter
тАв Keep ventilators/heaters in polyhouse

ЁЯМЕ **During Frost:**
тАв Don't enter field early morning
тАв Wait for ice to melt naturally

тШАя╕П **After Frost:**
тАв Light irrigation immediately after sun rises
тАв Spray Sulphuric Acid 0.1% to recover damaged plants
тАв Apply Urea 1% spray for quick recovery
тАв Remove severely damaged plant parts

ЁЯМ╛ **Crop-wise Protection:**
тАв **Potato/Tomato:** Cover with plastic/straw
тАв **Mustard:** Irrigate before frost
тАв **Wheat:** CRI irrigation helps
тАв **Peas/Gram:** Spray water at dawn

тЪая╕П **Susceptible Crops:**
тАв Potato, Tomato, Chilli
тАв Papaya, Banana
тАв Young seedlings of all crops

ЁЯТб **Tip:** IMD issues frost warnings - stay updated
